title: 1942년 McCrea 사건
summary: 미국 Michigan, MI 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: McCrea. 판결일: 1942-11-24. 법원: Michigan Supreme Court.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: People v. McCrea.
**판결일**: 1942-11-24
**법원**: Michigan Supreme Court
**관할**: Michigan, MI

**판사**: Boyles, Bushnell, Butzel, Chandler, North, Sharpe, Starr, Wiest

## 변호인

Duncan C. McCrea, in pro. per. 
  Herbert J. Rushton , Attorney General,  Edmund E. Shepherd , Solicitor General,  Thomas A. Kenney , Assistant Attorney General, and  Chester P. O'Hara , Special Prosecuting Attorney, for the people.

## 인용

- 6 N.W.2d 489
- 303 Mich. 213
